item.title: Email sent to MCDC’s CEO Chris Kempczinski and the Chief Legal Officer and Corporate Secretary Desiree Ralls-Morrison
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-03-16_0243_0800_email_to_kempczinski_ralls_morrison_mcd_bod_Redacted.pdf From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: I want to notify the Board of Directors of McDonald’s Corporation Date sent: March 16, 2023, 02:43 (Beijing time) To: Chris Kempczinski <Chris.Kempczinski@us.mcd.com>, Desiree Ralls-Morrison, Board of the Directors of McDonald’s Corporation <bod@us.mcd.com>, Corporate Secretary of McDonald’s Corporation, Global Compliance Office of McDonald’s Corporation <business.integrity@us.mcd.com> Cc: Many people including the FBI and the State Department, simply open the PDF to see who was notified
